name: Code Review of llm-lean-log
problem: Review source code structure and implementation
solution: Comprehensive code review of monorepo with core, CLI, and visualizer packages
action: Analyzed project architecture, reviewed key files, assessed code quality

name: Updated Common Rules Documentation
problem: Update common rules with proper git SHA and installation instructions
solution: Added before-run checklist with CLI installation, help command, and git SHA retrieval
action: Updated .windsurf/rules/common.md, .agent/rules/common.md, and README.md with enhanced logging instructions

name: Import LogEntry type from llm-lean-log-core
problem: LogEntry interface was defined locally in visualizer package instead of importing from core package
solution: Removed local LogEntry interface definition and imported from llm-lean-log-core package
action: Updated types.ts to import LogEntry from core package, added dependency to package.json, installed dependency with bun i

name: Fix TypeScript errors for optional LogEntry fields
problem: TypeScript errors when passing optional LogEntry fields to utility functions
solution: Updated parseTags and extractCode functions to accept string | undefined parameters
action: Modified utils.ts to handle optional fields, added null checks, verified TypeScript compilation

name: Fix CLI package.json for npm publication
problem: CLI package.json had incorrect entry points, missing build script, and wrong file configuration
solution: Added build script, updated main/module/bin fields to point to dist files, fixed files field to include dist instead of src, added prepublishOnly script
action: Modified package.json and tsconfig.json, tested build process, verified generated files in dist folder

name: convert lang-smith.md to full markdown
problem: Inconsistent and non-standard markdown formatting in lang-smith.md
solution: Formatted the file with proper markdown tables, code blocks (JSON and text), and standard horizontal rules
action: Updated docs/other-languages/vi/lang-smith.md with improved markdown structure

name: Create Memory MCP roadmap documentation
problem: Need to document the relationship between llm-lean-log and Memory MCP
solution: Created roadmap document explaining how llm-lean-log integrates with Memory MCP for long-term storage and retrieval
action: Added memory-mcp.md to docs/roadmap/ with conceptual framework and integration patterns

name: Improve CLI build to single file
problem: Build script was using --outdir which outputs to a directory with multiple files
solution: Changed to --outfile with --minify flag to create a single bundled JS file (1.26MB)
action: Updated build script in packages/cli/package.json

name: Add --human flag for help command
problem: Help text was always in human-readable format, making it less optimal for LLM consumption
solution: Changed default help output to CSV format for LLM readability, added --human flag to show human-readable format
action: Updated helpText to CSV format, modified help command handler to check for --human flag, added unit tests

name: Exclude dist from coverage
problem: Coverage report was including built dist/index.js files (42K+ lines) causing inaccurate coverage percentages (89% instead of 96%)
solution: Added dist directories to coveragePathIgnorePatterns in bunfig.toml to exclude bundled files from coverage
action: Updated bunfig.toml with patterns: dist/**, packages/core/dist/**, packages/cli/dist/**, packages/visualizer/dist/**

name: Simplify npm publish workflow
problem: Redundant npmrc configuration - workflow wrote token to ~/.npmrc but packages already have .npmrc files referencing NPM_TOKEN env var
solution: Removed echo command writing to ~/.npmrc, using bun publish --cwd instead of cd, packages .npmrc files handle token via env var
action: Updated release.yml publish steps to use simplified bun publish --cwd pattern

name: Translate README to Chinese
problem: README-zh.md contains Vietnamese text
solution: Translated the Vietnamese text to Chinese
action: Modified README-zh.md

name: Revert CLI Build Target
problem: Build target was set to bun but needed to be reverted to node.
solution: Reverted package.json build script to use --target node and updated CHANGELOG.md to reflect the change.
action: modify

name: Update Build Size in Changelog
problem: Build size changed after reverting to node target.
solution: Updated CHANGELOG.md with the new build size of ~1.14MB.
action: modify

name: Review tags wrapping logic
problem: User requested review of code for wrapping tags with double quotes if multiple tags are present, referencing README line 109.
solution: Verified that 'csv-utils.ts' correctly handles wrapping of fields with commas (like multiple tags) in double quotes using 'escapeCSVField'. Created and ran 'packages/core/src/tags_repro.test.ts' to confirm behavior.
action: Checked code, created reproduction test, verified tests pass.

name: Breakdown Memory MCP Roadmap
problem: Need to breakdown the high-level concept of Memory MCP into specific actionable tasks and a design document.
solution: Created docs/roadmap/memory-mcp/ directory, moved original doc to overview.md, created design.md with architecture/components, and task-manager.md with phased implementation tasks.
action: file_system_manipulation, create_file

name: Implement Memory MCP
problem: Need to implement the Memory MCP server as per the roadmap.
solution: Created packages/memory-mcp, implemented basic server with Resources (recent, stats), Tools (search_logs, get_task_history), and Prompts (summarize_recent_work). Used llm-lean-log-core for CSV parsing.
action: create_package, implement_feature

name: Refine Memory MCP Documentation
problem: Documentation formatting needed polish for better readability.
solution: Updated packages/memory-mcp/README.md with improved formatting for lists and JSON arguments.
action: update_file

name: Fix Import Sorting
problem: Imports were not sorted in memory-mcp/src/index.ts
solution: Reordered imports to put built-ins first
action: edit

name: Fix Memory MCP Index Signature Error
problem: Property 'query' comes from an index signature error in index.ts
solution: Changed property access from dot notation to bracket notation
action: Modified packages/memory-mcp/src/index.ts

name: Migrate Memory MCP to McpServer
problem: Deprecated Server class usage in memory-mcp
solution: Refactor index.ts to use McpServer class, replace request handlers with resource/tool/prompt registration methods
action: update src/index.ts

name: Replace deprecated resource/tool/prompt with register*
problem: Deprecated server.resource methods
solution: Migrate to server.registerResource, server.registerTool, and server.registerPrompt
action: update src/index.ts

name: Implement "cause" field
problem: Implement functionality described in README lines 139-143: optional 'cause' text field.
solution: Added 'cause' to LogEntry type, CSV headers, CLI add command/help, and Visualizer LogCard.
action: run bash bun test

name: Fix 'cause' property error
problem: Property 'cause' does not exist on type 'LogEntry' in LogCard.tsx
solution: Rebuilt packages/core to update outdated declaration files (dist/types.d.ts) which were missing the 'cause' property
action: bun run build (in packages/core)

name: Fix LogCard Undefined Action Error
problem: 'entry.action' is possibly 'undefined' in LogCard.tsx
solution: Added optional chaining to entry.action access
action: Modified packages/visualizer/src/components/LogCard.tsx

name: Write UT for Logger Cause Search
problem: Missing unit test for searching log entries by cause
solution: Added test case to logger.test.ts to verify search by cause functionality
action: Modified packages/core/src/logger.test.ts

name: Verify Help Text Includes Cause
problem: Need to verify that CLI help text includes the --cause option
solution: Modified packages/cli/src/index.test.ts to check for --cause in help output
action: Updated unit test

name: Verify CSV Column Order
problem: Need to ensure CSV parsing handles arbitrary column orders and gracefully handles schema changes (missing/extra columns)
solution: Added order-of-col.test.ts with tests for scrambled headers, missing columns, and extra columns
action: Created new test file

name: Verify CSV Migration Logic
problem: Older CSV files missing the 'cause' column need to automatically include it when saved to ensure data consistency with the new schema.
solution: Verified that the existing 'logEntriesToCSV' implementation uses a static 'CSV_HEADERS' list that includes 'cause'. This ensures that any saved CSV will include the 'cause' column header, even if the source data lacked it. The provided 'migration.test.ts' passes without modification.
action: verified

name: build with core and no peerDep
problem: Need to bundle core dependency and remove peer dependencies for CLI package.
solution: Moved llm-lean-log-core and typescript to devDependencies in packages/cli/package.json.
action: mod package.json

name: Update CHANGELOG for 0.2.7
problem: CHANGELOG entry was incomplete regarding peer dependency removal.
solution: Updated CHANGELOG entry to mention peer dependency removal.
action: mod CHANGELOG.md

name: Write UT for CLI index.bun.ts
problem: Lack of unit tests for CLI entry point and commands.
solution: Created index.bun.test.ts with integration tests for all major CLI commands (add, list, search, stats, tags).
action: Created packages/cli/src/index.bun.test.ts and verified all tests pass using bun test.

name: Write UT for CLI index.bun.ts
problem: Lack of unit tests for CLI entry point and commands.
solution: Created index.bun.test.ts with integration tests for all major CLI commands, including flags like --compact and --human.
action: Expanded integration tests in packages/cli/src/index.bun.test.ts and verified all 11 tests pass.

name: Implement UT for index.ts
problem: Lack of unit tests for CLI entry point index.ts.
solution: Implemented integration tests in index.test.ts covering all CLI commands and flags.
action: Created packages/cli/src/index.test.ts and verified tests pass.

name: Create MCP server for test packages/memory-mcp
problem: No dedicated MCP server app for testing memory-mcp package
solution: Created apps/mcp as a test server app, refactored memory-mcp to be a consumable library, and added unit tests
action: Created apps/mcp, refactored packages/memory-mcp, updated root package.json, added tests

name: Fix TypeScript undefined error in tests
problem: Object is possibly 'undefined' in data-access.test.ts
solution: Used optional chaining to safely access array elements in tests.
action: Modified packages/memory-mcp/src/data-access.test.ts

name: Separate MCP into library and server packages
problem: MCP server and logic were not separated for public export
solution: Separated MCP into l-log-mcp (library) and l-log-mcp-server (standalone app) in packages directory
action: Moved apps/mcp to packages/mcp-server, renamed packages/memory-mcp to packages/mcp, updated all references and root package.json

name: Improve unit test coverage for l-log-mcp
problem: Low test coverage for MCP package, specifically data-access logic and MCP handlers were not exercised
solution: Improved data-access.test.ts and added index.test.ts with mocked McpServer to test all handlers
action: Updated data-access.test.ts, created index.test.ts, ran coverage tests

name: Refactor MCP Library Entry Point
problem: index.ts in l-log-mcp had executable logic mixed with library exports
solution: Moved main function and execution logic to a separate main.ts file and updated package.json scripts
action: Created main.ts, cleaned up index.ts, updated package.json

name: Add OpenCode configuration to MCP README
problem: MCP README was missing configuration for OpenCode
solution: Researched OpenCode MCP configuration format and added it to the README with step-by-step instructions
action: Updated packages/mcp/README.md

name: Create AGENTS.md for OpenCode
problem: OpenCode needed a set of rules to follow project-specific logging and tool usage patterns
solution: Created AGENTS.md in the root directory with instructions for logging and using the llm-memory MCP server
action: Created AGENTS.md and updated packages/mcp/README.md

name: Add memory://last resource to MCP server
problem: Needed a quick way to view the very last log entry with full details through MCP
solution: Implemented memory://last resource in packages/mcp/src/index.ts and updated README configuration
action: Updated packages/mcp/src/index.ts and packages/mcp/README.md

name: Add more UT for packages/mcp/src/index.ts
problem: Lack of unit tests for last-log resource and respect limits for recent-logs and summarize_recent_work
solution: Added more unit tests to cover last-log resource, resource limits, empty logs case, and refreshCache functionality.
action: Updated index.test.ts

name: Enhance l-log-mcp-server convenience
problem: Developer convenience and missing OpenCode config examples on install
solution: Added postinstall message, --config flag, shebang support, and updated README
action: Added scripts/postinstall.js, updated package.json, src/index.ts, and README.md

name: Improve MCP packages & add version flag
problem: MCP server lacked version support; RECENT_LOGS_LIMIT was too low; mcp package documentation was confusing
solution: Added -v flags to mcp-server; bumped RECENT_LOGS_LIMIT to 50 in mcp-core; refactored mcp README as a library doc
action: Modified source code and tests; rewrote README

name: Add unit tests for MCP server CLI
problem: MCP server CLI lacked unit tests; entry point was not easily testable
solution: Refactored index.ts to export a testable run function; added comprehensive unit tests for version, help, config, and environment variable handling
action: Modified packages/mcp-server/src/index.ts and packages/mcp-server/src/index.test.ts

name: Fixed MCP Server Build Error
problem: MCP server build failed due to missing export in l-log-mcp package
solution: Fixed TypeScript configuration in l-log-mcp package to enable declaration generation
action: Updated tsconfig.json to set declaration: true and noEmit: false, then rebuilt and published l-log-mcp-server@0.1.2

name: Fixed TypeScript Lint Errors
problem: TypeScript lint errors due to conflicting emit settings and file output conflicts
solution: Updated tsconfig.json to use emitDeclarationOnly and fixed build script output directory
action: Modified packages/mcp/tsconfig.json and packages/mcp/package.json to resolve TypeScript compilation issues

name: Resolved TypeScript File Conflict Error
problem: TypeScript error about overwriting input file due to directory structure
solution: Updated tsconfig.json with proper include/exclude patterns and outDir configuration
action: Modified packages/mcp/tsconfig.json to properly separate source and output directories

name: Fix MCP Server Publish
problem: 403 Forbidden when publishing v0.1.2 (already exists) and reported duplicate key 'pub:mcp'
solution: Bumped version to 0.1.3 and verified root package.json for duplicates.
action: Modified packages/mcp-server/package.json and src/index.ts, ran bun publish.

name: Published MCP Server v0.1.6
problem: 403 Forbidden error due to existing version 0.1.5 on npm
solution: Incremented version to 0.1.6 and successfully published
action: Updated package.json and source code version references to 0.1.6, then published successfully

name: Limit Search Results
problem: Search results for search_logs were too many (20 items).
solution: Reduced SEARCH_LIMIT to 7 in packages/mcp/src/index.ts.
action: Modified SEARCH_LIMIT constant and updated inline comment.

name: Add Unit Tests for Learned Prompt
problem: Learned prompt in MCP handlers lacked unit tests.
solution: Added unit tests to packages/mcp/src/index.test.ts to verify filtering logic and limit handling.
action: Modified packages/mcp/src/index.test.ts and verified with bun test.

name: Implement Daily Standup Prompt
problem: The daily standup prompt was just a placeholder returning static text.
solution: Implemented the 'up' prompt to dynamically fetch logs from the last active day and format them for a standup meeting.
action: Modified packages/mcp/src/index.ts to use registerPrompt for 'up' and added unit tests in src/index.test.ts.

name: Update UT for Up Prompt
problem: Unit tests were failing after the implementation of the 'up' prompt was changed to include all logs and use updated messaging.
solution: Updated the test expectations in src/index.test.ts to match the new logic (including previous days' logs and 'last time' terminology).
action: Updated src/index.test.ts and verified with bun test.

name: Fix MCP Server Version Test
problem: MCP Server tests were failing because they expected version 0.1.1, while the package.json version was 0.1.6.
solution: Updated the test expectations in packages/mcp-server/src/index.test.ts to match the current version 0.1.6.
action: Modified packages/mcp-server/src/index.test.ts and verified with bun test.

name: Reconcile MCP Server Tests and Coverage
problem: MCP Server was starting twice during tests because run() was called on import. Also, some redundant code in the 'up' prompt was causing uncovered lines.
solution: Wrapped run() call in a check for import.meta.main and removed the redundant null check in mcp/src/index.ts. Updated tests to use the centralized MCP_SERVER_VERSION constant.
action: Modified packages/mcp-server/src/index.ts and packages/mcp/src/index.ts. Verified with bun test --coverage.

name: Implement Zig Release Script
problem: Need automated release script for MCP server package
solution: Created Zig script to increment version, build, test, commit, tag, and push releases
action: Implemented release.zig script with version increment, build, test, git operations

name: Update Release Script for TypeScript Const
problem: Release script only updated package.json, not TypeScript const file
solution: Added updateConstVersion function to update src/utils/const.ts version
action: Enhanced release.zig to update both package.json and TypeScript const file versions

name: Auto-populate last-commit-short-sha
problem: The last-commit-short-sha field required manual input from agents running git rev-parse --short HEAD, adding friction and potential for inconsistency
solution: Implemented auto-population of last-commit-short-sha by running git rev-parse --short HEAD automatically when the flag is not provided
action: Created git utility function, updated CLI add command, added unit tests for git utility and CLI, added migration tests for older CSV versions without the column

name: Create project icon
problem: The project lacked a visual identity/icon.
solution: Generated a cute, minimalist robot mascot holding a digital scroll using AI, and integrated it into the README files across all languages.
action: Used generate_image to create the icon, moved it to docs/imgs/logo.webp, and updated README and localizations.
files: docs/imgs/logo.webp, README.md, README-ja.md, README-vi.md, README-zh.md, packages/visualizer/README.md
